name: GKConstantNoiseSource
desc: A procedural noise generator that outputs a field of a single constant value.

items.name: init(value: Double)
items.desc: Initializes a noise source with the specified constant value.

items.name: class func constantNoise(withValue: Double) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a noise source with the specified constant value.

items.name: var value: Double
items.desc: The constant value for the generated noise.
